&#3942;&#4004;&#4017;&#3923;: [1671] ... 1) mig gi zhe sa/ ... spyan rnon po/ ... byams pa'i spyan gyis ming sring gnyis la gzigs nas bzhugs/ ... 2) thugs sems dang/ bka' drin/ ... 'tsho thabs bral ba'i rgan rgon nad pa sogs la gzhung nas yang yang spyan gyis bskyangs pa/ ...
deeper vision; (sublime) state/ level of insight; (higher/ deeper faculty of ) vision; way of seeing
Eyes / mig. The five eyes known as the physical eye, divine eye, eye of discriminating knowledge, Dharma eye and Buddha eye. eyes; / {mig} [the five] Eyes, organ of vision
